LEGAL DISCLOSURES AND DISCLAIMER

Choose Your Adventure provides high-risk activities with limited safeguards. Customer assumes all risk and acknowledges that such activities are all undertaken at the customer’s discretion. Anything that is being “done” to the customer can be ended at any time with the established SafeWord™ or SafeSignal™.

Choose Your Adventure actors, sets, vehicles, and technology have no special claim to safety. Customer has responsibility for judging the opportunities or indicated action with regard to his or her own ability. Actors are trained and prepared to provide storyline deviations when a suggested path appears to be ignored, dismissed, or balked at.

Adventures that are ended prematurely by customer choice are refunded on a pro-rated basis. Adventures that are ended because of unacceptable behavior on the part of the client are not refundable. Some adventures involve the theft or other acquisition of money or treasure. No promise of success is made. However, a successful mission may result in the refund of some of the customer’s payment for the adventure. This policy is subject to change.

Choose Your Adventure participants give consent to their photo or being acquired for security or development purposes. Cameras are used throughout company properties. Privacy applies to our storage of these images and not necessarily the capturing of the images, which is unstaged and ongoing.

All photos on this website are stock photography licensed for use here.

Choose Your Adventure is an imaginary business and everything described on this website is fiction.
